org.jchassis.termctl
Class ModifierKey

java.lang.Object
  org.jchassis.termctl.Key
      org.jchassis.termctl.ModifierKey

public class ModifierKey
extends Key

A representation of a modifier key on a keyboard. These are used for contructing keystrokes.
